input.sentences: the window view hints at the glorious times that await them .
the waves are picking up as the anticipation is building .
finally a better glimpse of the old civilization brings relief .

output.sentences: There are times the view out the window is impressive.
The waves seem to be picking on the building supplies on the ship.
It is a relief to finally get a glimpse of land.
Once we arrive we will begin the exploration.
Time spent watching sunsets are the best.
